name: GetReactionInfo
description:
Retrieve detailed information about a Trello reaction.

Use this tool to obtain detailed information for a specific reaction associated with a Trello action. Call this tool when you need to understand more about the reaction context or details.

parameters.name: include_member
parameters.description: Set to true to load the member as a nested resource.

value_schema.description: Whether to load the member as a nested resource. See [Members Nested Resource](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/nested-resources/#members-nested-resource)

parameters.name: load_emoji_as_nested_resource
parameters.description: Set to true to include emoji details as a nested resource in the reaction information.

value_schema.description: Whether to load the emoji as a nested resource.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the trello API.

parameters.name: member
parameters.description: Whether to load the member as a nested resource. See [Members Nested Resource](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/nested-resources/#members-nested-resource)

value_schema.description: Whether to load the member as a nested resource. See [Members Nested Resource](/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/nested-resources/#members-nested-resource)

parameters.name: emoji
parameters.description: Whether to load the emoji as a nested resource.

value_schema.description: Whether to load the emoji as a nested resource.
